Deficiency Narrative: Medication for discharged children was found amongst current medication for children in care.
Service Plans reviews were conducted after 180 days.
Correction Narrative: Action Plan: A meeting was held on May 29, 2024 with caseworkers and quality assurance worker regarding Service Plan  Review of Content and Deadline. Besides the database the agency uses to calculate the deadline for the service plan review, the quality assurance worker will use Excel and the caseworkers will calculate the days the service plan is due as well to make sure the plan of service review is completed within the 180 days.

Deficiency Narrative: During the walkthrough, there was one cottage with several bee hives in the corners of the roof.
Staff files were not available at the moment of the inspection, and are located in a third party facility.
